mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member where userid = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( email, userid, name, userpw, phone, regdate, approval_status, approval_key, gender ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{userid}, #{name}, #{userpw}, #{phone}, SYSDATE(), 'false', #{approval_key}, #{gender} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET approval_status = 'true' where email = #{email} and approval_key = #{approval_key}
mapper.select: SELECT mno, mstate, mem.userid, userpw, name, email, pwdate, approval_status, enabled, auth.authority FROM member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN member_auth auth ON mem.userid = auth.userid WHERE mem.userid = #{userid} AND auth.sessionKey=#{value} AND sessionLimit > sysdate()
SELECT name, userid, userpw, regdate FROM member where userid=#{userid} and userpw=#{userpw}
